verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> day הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> On the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> of the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> month תָּקִ֕ים <WH6965> shalt thou set up אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁכַּ֖ן <WH4908> the tabernacle אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <WH7760> And thou shalt put שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> therein אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <WH5715> of the testimony וְסַכֹּתָ֥ <WH5526> and cover עַל־ <WH5921> and הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> the ark אֶת־ <WH854> with הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> with the vail

וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <WH935> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָ֔ן <WH7979> in the table וְעָרַכְתָּ֖ <WH6186> and set in order אֶת־ <WH853> עֶרְכּ֑וֹ <WH6187> the things that are to be set in order וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <WH935> upon it and thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹרָ֔ה <WH4501> in the candlestick וְהַעֲלֵיתָ֖ <WH5927> and light אֶת־ <WH853> נֵרֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5216> the lamps

וְנָתַתָּ֞ה <WH5414> And thou shalt set אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> the altar הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> of gold לִקְטֹ֔רֶת <WH7004> for the incense לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <WH5715> of the testimony וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ <WH7760> and put אֶת־ <WH853> מָסַ֥ךְ <WH4539> the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> of the door לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> to the tabernacle

וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <WH5414> And thou shalt set אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering לִפְנֵ֕י <WH6440> before פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> the door מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְנָֽתַתָּ֙ <WH5414> And thou shalt set אֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיֹּ֔ר <WH3595> the laver בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> between the tent מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> and the altar וְנָתַתָּ֥ <WH5414> and shalt put שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> And thou shalt set up אֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> the court סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ <WH5414> and hang up אֶת־ <WH853> מָסַ֖ךְ <WH4539> the hanging שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> gate הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> at the court

וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> the anointing וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <WH4886> and anoint אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בּ֑וֹ וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <WH6942> and all that [is] therein and shalt hallow אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֖יו <WH3627> it and all the vessels וְהָ֥יָה <WH1961> become קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> thereof and it shall be holy

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֛ <WH4886> And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> and all his vessels וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֙ <WH6942> and sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> the altar וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> and it shall be an altar קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> most קָֽדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> holy
וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <WH4886> And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <WH3595> the laver וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּנּ֑וֹ <WH3653> and his foot וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֖ <WH6942> and sanctify אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֤ <WH7126> And thou shalt bring אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> and his sons אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <WH7364> and wash אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> them with water

וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֙ <WH3847> And thou shalt put אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> upon Aaron אֵ֖ת <WH854> for בִּגְדֵ֣י <WH899> garments הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <WH4886> and anoint אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <WH6942> him and sanctify אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> וְכִהֵ֥ן <WH3547> him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃
וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <WH7126> And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֥ <WH3847> and clothe אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <WH3801> them with coats

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ <WH4886> And thou shalt anoint אֹתָ֗ם <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you מָשַׁ֙חְתָּ֙ <WH4886> them as thou didst anoint אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> their father וְכִהֲנ֖וּ <WH3547> that they may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י וְ֠הָיְתָה <WH1961> will qualify לִהְיֹ֨ת <WH1961> will qualify לָהֶ֧ם מָשְׁחָתָ֛ם <WH4888> for their anointing לִכְהֻנַּ֥ת <WH3550> priesthood עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> shall surely be an everlasting לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <WH1755> throughout their generations

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> Thus did מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> according to all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> him so did ס

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become בַּחֹ֧דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן <WH7223> And it came to pass in the first בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> year הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> in the second בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הוּקַ֖ם <WH6965> was reared up הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> [that] the tabernacle

וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> reared up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ן <WH4908> the tabernacle וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and fastened אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדָנָ֔יו <WH134> his sockets וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <WH7760> and set up אֶת־ <WH853> קְרָשָׁ֔יו <WH7175> the boards וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> thereof and put אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיחָ֑יו <WH1280> in the bars וַיָּ֖קֶם <WH6965> thereof and reared up אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּוּדָֽיו׃ <WH5982> his pillars

וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <WH6566> And he spread abroad אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <WH168> the tent עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> over the tabernacle וַיָּ֜שֶׂם <WH7760> and put אֶת־ <WH853> מִכְסֵ֥ה <WH4372> the covering הָאֹ֛הֶל <WH168> of the tent עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> over מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> above כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> upon it as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> And he took וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֵדֻת֙ <WH5715> the testimony אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <WH727> into the ark וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and set אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <WH905> the staves עַל־ <WH5921> unto הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> on the ark וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat עַל־ <WH5921> of הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> upon the ark מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> above

וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֹן֮ <WH727> the ark אֶל־ <WH413> into הַמִּשְׁכָּן֒ <WH4908> into the tabernacle וַיָּ֗שֶׂם <WH7760> and set up אֵ֚ת <WH853> פָּרֹ֣כֶת <WH6532> the vail הַמָּסָ֔ךְ <WH4539> of the covering וַיָּ֕סֶךְ <WH5526> and covered עַ֖ל <WH5921> and אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <WH5715> of the testimony כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <WH7979> the table בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation עַ֛ל <WH5921> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <WH3409> upon the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle צָפֹ֑נָה <WH6828> northward מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without לַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> the vail

וַיַּעֲרֹ֥ךְ <WH6186> in order עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and עֵ֥רֶךְ <WH6187> And he set לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> the bread לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> upon it before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <WH4501> the candlestick בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> over against הַשֻּׁלְחָ֑ן <WH7979> the table עַ֛ל <WH5921> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <WH3409> on the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> southward

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> And he lighted הַנֵּרֹ֖ת <WH5216> the lamps לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיָּ֛שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> altar הַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> the golden בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tent מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <WH6532> the vail

וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <WH6999> And he burnt עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> incense סַמִּ֑ים <WH5561> sweet כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> thereon as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses פ
וַיָּ֛שֶׂם <WH7760> And he set up אֶת־ <WH853> מָסַ֥ךְ <WH4539> the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [at] the door לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> of the tabernacle

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar הָעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> of burnt offering שָׂ֕ם <WH7760> And he put פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [by] the door מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> of the tent מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> and offered עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָה֙ <WH5930> upon it the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> and the meat offering כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <WH7760> And he set אֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּיֹּ֔ר <WH3595> the laver בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> between the tent מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> and the altar וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and put שָׁ֛מָּה <WH8033> in it מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water לְרָחְצָֽה׃ <WH7364> there to wash

וְרָחֲצ֣וּ <WH7364> washed מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> and Aaron וּבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands וְאֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH7272> and their feet

בְּבֹאָ֞ם <WH935> When they went אֶל־ <WH413> about אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> into the tent מוֹעֵ֗ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּבְקָרְבָתָ֛ם <WH7126> and when they came near אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> unto the altar יִרְחָ֑צוּ <WH7364> they washed כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses ס

וַיָּ֣קֶם <WH6965> And he reared up אֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָצֵ֗ר <WH2691> the court סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> round about לַמִּשְׁכָּ֣ן <WH4908> the tabernacle וְלַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> and the altar וַיִּתֵּ֕ן <WH5414> and set up אֶת־ <WH853> מָסַ֖ךְ <WH4539> the hanging שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הֶחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> of the court וַיְכַ֥ל <WH3615> finished מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> So Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> the work פ

וַיְכַ֥ס <WH3680> covered הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> Then a cloud אֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tent מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וּכְב֣וֹד <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מָלֵ֖א <WH4390> filled אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> the tabernacle

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> was not יָכֹ֣ל <WH3201> was not able מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> to enter אֶל־ <WH413> about אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> into the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because שָׁכַ֥ן <WH7931> abode עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> and הֶעָנָ֑ן <WH6051> because the cloud וּכְב֣וֹד <WH3519> thereon and the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מָלֵ֖א <WH4390> filled אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> the tabernacle

וּבְהֵעָל֤וֹת <WH5927> was taken up הֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> And when the cloud מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> over the tabernacle יִסְע֖וּ <WH5265> went onward בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מַסְעֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4550> in all their journeys
